title: Suffocating 'Pollution pods' shock visitors for Earth Day
text:
Suffocating 'Pollution pods' shock visitors for Earth Day   01:55 
It’s no secret that London is one smoggy city. But how does it compare to other places around the world? British artist Michael Pinsky has created ‘pollution pods’ from five different atmospheres across three continents: from the Norwegian island of Tautra to Beijing, Delhi and Sao Paulo. Rosanna Philpott reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
